entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries this evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023
